contact: J. Burch, D. Gershman @ SwRI, GSFC

parameters.name: mms1_des_errorflags_slow
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES vector of data-quality indicators at survey-start time

parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES Del-Phi (obs spin-phase) count at survey-start time

parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES Del-Phi (obs spin-phase) angle at survey-start time

parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES electron pitch-angle distribution for "mid" energies during this survey

parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES electron pitch-angle distribution for "high" energies during this survey

parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES electron number density during this survey

parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES estimated (via extrapolation to infinity) contribution to density integral above 30keV
